channel.title: Homecomfort on GoodThings4U - premium products straight to your doorstep.
channel.description: Recent content in Homecomfort on GoodThings4U - premium products straight to your doorstep.

item.title: Funny and warm shark slippers
item.description: Free Shipping! Winter is coming! No more cold feet with these plush, sweet shark slippers. They are not only ultra-warm and plush, but also cuddly.

item.title: Invertable Happy/Sad Squid Cuddly Toy
item.description: Free Shipping! By turning this cute little squid inside out you can change your mood from sad to happy in no time!

item.title: Mini Steelpan Instrument
item.description: Free Shipping! If you are looking for a musical instrument that cleanses your mind and calms your heart, then the Mini Steel Tongue Drum is for you!
